author: jgm
content:
I think that at this point cutting a V2.0.0 is sensible.  If we need a V2.x.0, or a V2.0.x, it gives us the opportunity to do so but no requirement.

Sounds like there are no outstanding items, shall we look to release tomorrow if no-one comes up with any last-minute change requests?

author: mpetrunic
content: Yeah, will do. Just need to merge one more  Pr of yours
